sub_title: Lead Software Engineer at EPAM Systems
summary:
Lead Software Engineer with 10-years of experience in front-end development. 
The primary skill is Javascript. I have had experience with AngularJS and Angular, the last experience is React + Redux stack, Experienced with NodeJS through Express, knows principles of Auth and Security. 
Has been involved in projects in different phases: from scratch, support, proof of concepts, architectural designs, and projects in the active development phase. 
Has worked within different SDLCs:  Scrum, Kanban, a little bit of lean.
Troubleshooting and analysis skills, working successfully in a multicultural environment, and having experience in defect analysis.
Taking part in interview processes in the company: as an expert and as a head of the committee.
Involved in people development and mentoring as an expert and contact person for newcomers.

school.name: Belarusian State University of Informatics and Radioelectronics
Belarusian State University of Informatics and Radioelectronics

certifications.name: Transitioning from Technical Professional to Manager

projects.title: Mortgage platform for customer from USA
projects.description:
Creating the application from scratch. Integration with different third-party services.

As a Development Frontend Team Lead, I am responsible for:
* Preparing project front-end architecture, and getting an agreement with the client about the approach (establishing base micro-frontend application structure).
* Creating complex logic for rendering forms configured in Excel (including validation rules, dependent fields, and dynamic items).
* Providing UX design recommendations for edge cases.
* Creating project documentation including code standards, and guidelines pages, documentation for another vendor onboarding.
* Taking part in investigation and clarification requirements with BA, preparing a mechanism for assistance with the generation of new tickets.
* Preparing tasks for the FE team, explaining ideas and business value to them, and providing draft solutions for complex tasks.
* Developing global parts of the application, solving complex tasks for unblocking other teammates in a short-term manner.
* Interviewing new teammates from the market and from the company, preparing a personal onboarding plan.

2 scrum teams:
International team.

Technologies: React, Typescript, Redux, Jest, RTK, NodeJS, react-hook-form, styled-components

contributors.headline: Lead Software Engineer at EPAM Systems

projects.title: Application for Loan Company (USA)
projects.description:
Creating the application from scratch. Integration with different third-party services.

As a Development Team Lead I am responsible for:
* Preparing project front-end architecture, getting an agreement with the client about approach (establish base micro-frontend application structure).
* Creating project documentation including code standards, guidelines pages.
* Participating in global SA meetings and making agreements with BE team about integrations.
* Taking part in investigation and clarification requirements with BA, preparing a mechanism for assistance with the generation of new tickets.
* Leading 4 development teams: preparing tasks for them, explaining ideas and business value for them, providing draft solutions for complex tasks.
* Developing global parts of the application, solving complex tasks for unblocking other teammates in a short-term manner.
* Interviewing new teammates from the market and from the company, preparing a personal onboarding plan, preparing pages with frequently asked questions.
* Participation in the leadership decision about processes and workflows.

4 scrum teams:
More than 8 front-end engineers.
The total team size is about 30 persons. (BA, QA, BE, DM, SA)
International team.

Technologies: React, Typescript, Redux, RTK, Microfrontends, NodeJS, AWS, Formik

contributors.headline: Lead Software Engineer at EPAM Systems

projects.title: Set of applications for financial, software and data company
projects.description:
The set of applications for control, analyzing, and reviewing financial data flow (latency, visualization of customer network, logs).

As a Development Team Lead I am responsible for:
* Developing new features/performance optimizations/bug fixing as a regular developer
* Solving conflict situation in the team: lost motivation, low performance, estimations issues, conflicts between functional teams
* Investigating customer technical ideas, providing different options, getting agreements with BA and customer about priorities
* Taking part in the estimation process, provide extended argumentation about the mark, highlight the risks
* Creation POC and optimize the development process (creating test data generator for different options)
* Tightly work with BA and QA team for increasing the development speed (ticket separation, simplifying the requirements, decrease priority, setting up dependencies, fixes on the fly)

Team
6 front-end developers
The total team size is 11 persons (UX, BA, QA, PM)

Technologies	React, Redux, RxJS, Typescript

contributors.headline: Lead Software Engineer at EPAM Systems

projects.title: Conference Web Application for Software Company
projects.description:
The application for handling global online events (conferences).
The main goal was integration with third-party services and creating custom reusable components for the customer platform. The application consists of different blocks, which are using different technologies, some of the components were created in Native Javascript, the other part in ReactJS.

As a Technician Team Lead I was responsible:
- investigation and POC creation
- estimations
- for solution/architectural decisions
- team management and consulting
- communication with customer's development team
- helping customer's development team with their part of development

Technologies: Javascript, React, AEM, CSS

contributors.headline: Lead Software Engineer at EPAM Systems

projects.title: Project for financial domain (trades, dealings) - Customer from USA
projects.description:
This was an urgent project, our team was called to solve the problem and run the project in time.
I was involved as a team lead for the front-end team.
The project had issues with SDMM, but we do as much as we can for fixing this. 
As a result, my team has done all the necessary tasks on time and we got positive feedback.
Technically it was difficult projects (I cannot share the whole details there), but it was angular application with a lot of legacy jquery components from the old app and it was the main challenge to composite these two part into one working application.

projects.title: Project for global information services and publishing company - customer from USA
projects.description:
This is project for large american company in publishing sphere. Main task is creating new, modern version, of previous application. 
Development single page application using AngularJS and some customer wrapper for this. Workflow includes creating separate branch for every ticket, creating pull requests and code review. Also NodeJS and MongoDB available on server side for some little middle-ware (like caching, unzipping and admin part).
Technologies: AngularJS 1.4, Git, Responsive Web Design, Bootstarap, NodeJs, MongoDB, Sass
